name: MysteryWord
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mystery word
des: Kids always view vocabularies as mystery words. So, we have designed a skill for kids to learn new mystery words everyday. As enhancement of this skill, there would be a game with alexa saying 3 hints of words with which its synonym has to be found. Both the hints and the word to be found starts with same letter.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
